ðŸ“– How to Play

ðŸŽ® Basic Controls

  • Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar (double jump available!)
  • Swim: Use arrow keys in water (1.5x faster than walking)
  • Jetpack: Hold Shift while in air (if collected)
  • Laser Charge: Hold left mouse button to charge (unlocks at level 10, 20, 30, etc.)
  • Golden Chest: Press F key near chest with key

ðŸŽ¯ Game Mechanics

  • Goal: Reach the flag at the end of each level
  • Platforms: Jump on static, moving, and disappearing platforms
  • Checkpoints: Touch to activate - respawn here if you fall
  • Water Physics: Swim underwater, different movement mechanics
  • Breakable Tiles: Stomp or shoot to reveal secrets
  • Secret Rooms: Hidden areas with rare treasures
  • Boss Battles: Every 5 levels - defeat Captain Claws!
